---
title: "Pré visualização"
---

BRA <- ne_states(country = "Brazil", returnclass = "sf")

PA <- BRA |>
  filter(name_en == "Pará")

star <- data.frame(
  x = -48.5, # longitude
  y = -1.45  # latitude
)

ggplot(BRA) +
  geom_sf(fill = "white", color = "black", linewidth = 0.5) +
  geom_sf(data = PA, fill = "red") +
  geom_point(data = star, aes(x = x, y = y), shape = 8, color = "blue", size = 5) +
  theme_void()
